ARGUMENT
z

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | cbvdisj.1 | |- F/_ y B |
| 2 |  | cbvdisj.2 | |- F/_ x C |
| 3 |  | cbvdisj.3 | |- ( x = y -> B = C ) |
| 4 | 1 | #P_nfcri | |- F/ y z e. B |
| 5 | 2 | #P_nfcri | |- F/ x z e. C |

| 7 | 4, 5, 6 | #P_cbvrmo | |- ( E* x e. A z e. B <-> E* y e. A z e. C ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_albii | |- ( A. z E* x e. A z e. B <-> A. z E* y e. A z e. C ) |
| 9 |  | #P_df-disj | |- ( Disj_ x e. A B <-> A. z E* x e. A z e. B ) |
| 10 |  | #P_df-disj | |- ( Disj_ y e. A C <-> A. z E* y e. A z e. C ) |
| 11 | 8, 9, 10 | #P_3bitr4i | |- ( Disj_ x e. A B <-> Disj_ y e. A C ) |
